name: Freelancer
description: Designed and implemented the user interface for an NFT deployment into metaverse service's middleware with figma, utilizing the established company color scheme. Developed frontend components using vue3 to enhance user experience and meet changing requirements in an agile environment. Collaborated closely with PO to ensure maximum usability and functionality.

name: Diligent
description: Developed and implemented angular frontend components, improving the user experience. Conducted thorough UI testing to ensure optimal functionality and usability. Collaborated closely with stakeholders in an agile environment, ensuring effective communication and alignment on UI/UX vision..

name: Deel Kft.
description: Built a User Interface connected to a headless node.js CMS system (Strapi) for administrators. Created and Edited basic RESTful API endpoints with node.js (Strapi). Created basic design for a functional user interface together with the senior developer
